title: Digital Mastery of Traditional Crafts: Web-Based Multimedia Courseware

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targeting working professionals, learning occurs outside work hours with BYOD access via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce over 80% of traditional craft techniques (e.g., weaving, pattern-making) through web courseware.
Learners can identify and explain the use of craft tools with 90% accuracy in a digital simulation environment.
Learners can complete project deliverables, including peer assessments, using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
